data.title: Smith Earns Bronze, Keane Named Rookie of the Meet to Highlight Iona Women's OTF at MAAC Championships
data.meta_description: The Iona University women's outdoor track and field team completed action at the 2024 MAAC Championships, hosted by Rider University. Junior Holly Smith was the
data.text:
LAWRENCEVILLE, NJ - The Iona University women's outdoor track and field team completed action at the 2024 MAAC Championships, hosted by Rider University. Junior Holly Smith was the Gaels medal winner on the afternoon, earning bronze in the 1,500-meter event. Freshman Claragh Keane was named Rookie of the Meet for her bronze medal in the 10,000-meter run on Saturday.

1,500-METER RUN

Smith finished third in the 1,500-meter run, posting a career-best time of 4:35.91. The mark enters her name into the Top 25 on Iona's all-time performance list. It was her third medal of the 2023-24 campaign after indoor 3k gold and indoor 5k silver and fourth overall following bronze at the 2020-21 cross country championship. Junior Cosmina Spiridon finished 10th in 4:52.18.

400-METER RUN

Sophomore Nadine Jefremow earned seventh place points for the Gaels in the 400-meter event. She remains just shy of cracking the minute mark after posting her fourth time of the season under 61 seconds at 1:00.15.

5000-METER RUN

Sophomore McKenna Arguien was eighth overall in the 5,000-meter run with her personal best time of 18:17.34. She lowered her previous best time from the METS Championships in April by nearly 23 seconds.

4X100-METER RELAY

Jefremow, junior Katie Menard, and seniors Jamie Gudyka and Tonian Fullerton finished eighth in the 4x100 meter relay (53.55)

4X400-METER RELAY

Gudyka, Menard, Jefremow and sophomore Kate Tugman, earned eighth place points in the day's final event, the 4x400 meter relay (4:16.55)

DISCUS THROW

Freshman Tyaja Thomas was the top performer for the Gaels in the discus throw, finishing 10th with a personal best throw of 33.07m. Fullerton (15th, 28.77m) also competed.

SHOT PUT THROW

Thomas was the Gaels top shot putter, tossing a 9.92m throw.

IONA PERFORMERS

400: Nadine Jefremow, 7th, 1:00.15. 1500: Holly Smith, 3rd, 4:35.91; Cosmina Spiridon, 10th, 4:52.18. 5k: McKenna Arguien, 8th, 18:17.34. Discus: Tyaja Thomas, 10th, 33.07m; Tonian Fullerton, 15th, 28.77m. Shot Put: Tyaja Thomas, 16th, 9.92m; Megan Sterbenz, 23rd, 4.96m; Lauren Sonski, 24th, 4.18m. 4x100: N. Jefremow, K. Menard, J. Gudyka, T. Fullerton, 8th, 53.55. 4x400: J. Gudyka, K. Menard, K. Tugman, N. Jefremow, 8th, 4:16.55.

UP NEXT

The Gaels take on the 2024 ECAC Championships in Fairfax, VA next weekend.

SOCIAL MEDIA

Be sure to follow Iona University athletics on all social media platforms:

Iona Gaels: Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and YouTube (Email Updates).

Iona Cross Country/Track: Twitter, Facebook and Instagram.
